name: Leanne Graham
comment: Very good product and excellent quality. The service from the supplier is excellent, very friendly, I would gladly place an order again.

name: Julie Hamilton
comment: I loved them. the case is very practical and design of the headphone is very ergonomic. I recommend buying from this store , plus excellent customer service.

name: Bernard Keller
comment: The package was very nice and they look really good. However, I could still hear people talking. I gave a four star because i immediately got a headache when I turned on the noise cancelling part.

name: Louis Burton
comment: I loved the headphones, I hope to place a bigger order next time

name: Lynn Peters
comment: Everything is good, the price and quality are compatible.
